////////////////// Git Command Sheet //////////////////

Git Setup

git config --global user.name "satyam"

Start project

git init <dir>

git clone git@github.com:Satyams-23/MyPortfolio.git

Make change

git add <file name>

git add .

git commit -m "hello"

git commit -am "both add and commit"

Branch

git branch -a //-r

create branch

git branch < new b>

switch

git checkout <branch>

git checkout -b <branch>

git branch -d < new b> (delete branch)

Url Add

git remote add origin git@github.com:Satyams-23/Confuse_Coder.git

git remote

git fetch

git merge

git pull origin main

push

git push origin main
